task.title: Uploading Maestro VM image to OpenStack

context.p: This procedure provides instructions on how to upload the Maestro VM image to OpenStack. For additional information, see OpenStack documentation.
To upload the Maestro VM image:

step.cmd: In OpenStack dashboard, click the Project tab, then click the Compute tab, then click the Images tab and then click the Create image button. The Create Image dialog box appears.
In the Create Image dialog box, enter the required information and then click the Create image button.
